actions.name: Foreboding Winds
actions.text:
[Q].

If this attack deals two or more damage to the enemy monster,
[+] [+] then [-] [-].

actions.name: Whirlwind
actions.text: If this action is faster, this attack gains +3[ATK].~FASTER~

actions.name: Vicious Hurricane
actions.text:
Single use.

This attack gains
+X[ATK]
where X is equal to your speed minus the enemy monster's speed. If the opponent selected a non-monster action this turn, this attack gains
+2[ATK]
instead. ~SINGLE~

buffs.buffText: At the start of the turn, [+] then [-]. ~AURA~

Super [B] [B].

Perform a switch action after the monster action phase. ~SUPER~

name: Galeaffy
text:
When this monster switches in or out,
[+] [+] then [-] [-].
~SWITCH~
promiseDescription: The master of speed has arrived!
